lines.text:
[watching Jim swim to his boat to save his wife]
Ciao baby.

[peering down at two boats from an airplane]
Do you know that boat?
If it's the one I think it is then it's the only one around here like her!

[sifting through Rich's drugs]
Mother Hashish has arrived!

[tender voice-over as a plane flying over snow-covered mountains is shown]
Tomorrow I'm going to take you into a very special place.

[asking earnestly, also in voice-over]
Is is a special place?
Shut up you junkies! I don't listen to junkies!
